          <title>
            <string language="en">Attraction of unlike poles of magnets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung der verschiedenen Pfosten der Magneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction des pôles des aimants différents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atração de pólos desiguais dos ímãs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione dai dei poli dissimili dei magneti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλξη αντίθετα από τους πόλους των μαγνητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracción de postes desemejantes de imanes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how magnets attract each other through opposite poles.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north-seeking poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south-seeking poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Magneten durch 
gegenüberliegende Pfosten sich anziehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les aimants 
s'attirent par les pôles opposés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os ímãs se atraem
através dos pólos opostos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come i magneti si 
attraggono attraverso i poli opposti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι μαγνήτες 
προσελκύουν ο ένας τον άλλον μέσω των αντίθετων πόλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo los imanes se 
atraen a través de postes opuestos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Anziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
